summary: DOOR AJAR/ DOOR LATCH ISSUE. WHEN MY DOOR ARE CLOSED IT STILL SAYS ITS OPEN I HAVE ONLY HAD THIS CAR FOR YEAR AND HALF AND I WANT TO REFUSE TO DRIVE IT BECAUSE I HAVE 2 KIDS AND THE DOORS WILL NOT LOCK WHILE DRIVING AND MY LIGHTS IN THE CAR STAY ON. I BEEN READINGS ITS HUGE ISSUE WITH FORD, I REFUSE TO PAY $500 BUCKS FOR SOMETHING THAT SHOULD BE FIX ALREADY. WHAT DO I DO?>
